sqlMap.select: select CUSTOM_FIELD_ID, FIELD_NAME as CUS_FLD_FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE as CUS_FLD_FIELD_VALUE from CUSTOM_FIELD where CUSTOM_FIELD_ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into CUSTOM_FIELD (CUSTOM_FIELD_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE) values (#id#, #name#, #value#)
